feed.title: Streamyfin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: casting broken on 0.17.0 by @jakequade in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/174
  • fix: video rotation bug by updating screen dimensions dynamically using an event listener by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/177
  • feat: Hide 0h on play button when media length is lower than an hour by @simoncaron in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/183

New Contributors

  • @simoncaron made their first contribution in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.21.0
entry.content:
This release includes a new native VLC player that supports almost all codecs and formats for both Android and iOS. This means you can probably direct stream anything! Selecting lower bitrates is still available for those who want or need it, of course.

We also have more features and bug fixes that have been delayed due to the significance of this release, so please be patient if your bug or feature is not included yet! However, please report any issues you have by opening an issue here on GitHub.

The release is available on Play Store (2 Dec) and soon on the App Store.

Please join our Discord for beta updates, feature requests, and more: Join here

What's Changed

  • feat: native tabbar by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/166
  • feat: new vlc player by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/178
  • fix: update visual playback when exiting video by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/181
  • feat: vlc support for android by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/226
  • fix: some edge cases with dropdown by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/234
  • feat: added change to show actual device name rather than platform by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/235

Known problems

  • Some Android devices have issues with rotation in combination with Controls in the video player
  • Slow loading times for certain video codecs/formats

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/compare/v0.18.0...v0.21.0

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.22.0
entry.content:
Don't let the small increase from 0.21.0 fool you, there's A LOT of improvements in this release. Merry Christmas! üéÑ

App and Play Store releases are awaiting aproval.

What's Changed

  • feat: Allow option for viewing custom menu links by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/229
  • feat: New downloads page for downloaded TV-Series by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/231
  • feat: Add download size to offline media downloads by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/232
  • feat: Add Button to download whole series/Season by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/233
  • feat: Add MacOS fullscreen support by @MateuszKukiela in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/210
  • feat: Downloaded item size by @herrrta
  • feat: Show app size usage by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/243
  • feat: Multiple simultaneous remux downloads by @herrrta in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/247
  • feat: Better video controls @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/248
  • feat: Added the ability to change subtitle size by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/249
  • feat: Prefetch trick-play images by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/255
  • fix: websockets now work globally with vlc and transcoded player by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/263
  • feat: episode list in player by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/264
  • feat: audio slider in controls by @Alexk2309 in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/272
  • feat: go to next episode countdown by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/276
  • feat: add video file details to item by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/297
  • feat: setting toggle for safe areas in controls by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/304
  • feat: context menu actions for items by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/303

New Contributors

  • @herrrta made their first contribution in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/229
  • @MateuszKukiela made their first contribution in https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/pull/210

Full Changelog: https://github.com/fredrikburmester/streamyfin/compare/v0.21.0...v0.22.0

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.23.0
entry.content:
New Streamyfin Update! üéâ

As we welcome the new year, we‚Äôre excited to share some great updates!

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new:

  • Jellyseerr Integration: Request content directly from Streamyfin.
  • Favorites: Easily add and access your favorite content.
  • New Settings Design: A more intuitive, visually appealing layout.
  • Server Memory: Save and reconnect to previously used servers.
  • Other Changes: Various performance improvements and bug fixes.

üîó App Store Links iOS | Android

‚≠ê A star on our Github page means a lot to us and helps increase visibility. Your support helps us grow and reach more users!

üí¨ Share feedback or new suggestions on our Discord server

Details

  • Fix merged versions showing as separate media in listings. by @lostb1t in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/311
  • Jellyseerr Integration by @herrrta in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/309
  • Favorites tab by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/345
  • Refactor settings by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/349

New Contributors

  • @retardgerman made their first contribution in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/338
  • @sldless made their first contribution in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0

entry.title: New release for Streamyfin: v0.24.0
entry.content:
Another release! üöÄ

iOS version approved. Still waiting for Play Store approval for Android.

What's Changed

  • Implement CI/CD pipeline for iOS building by @Stetsed in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/355
  • feat: hide libraries from libraries tab by @fredrikburmester in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/378
  • feat: haptic feedback settings and custom hook by @anubhavvs in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/377
  • [Jellyseerr] Show facts about media result by @herrrta in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/370
  • [Jellyseerr] Add external links to trailers by @herrrta in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/371
  • [Jellyseerr] Add cast/crew results by @herrrta in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/372
  • feat: new intro page (shown once) by @fredrikburmester

New Contributors

  • @Stetsed made their first contribution in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/355
  • @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/376
  • @anubhavvs made their first contribution in https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/pull/377

Full Changelog: https://github.com/streamyfin/streamyfin/compare/v0.23.0...v0.24.0
